ðŸ“– Summary: ScreenCoder is an intelligent UI-to-code generation system that converts screenshots into clean, editable HTML/CSS. It employs a modular multi-agent architecture, combining visual understanding and adaptive code synthesis. The system supports customized modifications, bridging the gap between design and development for rapid prototyping and pixel-perfect interfaces.
